result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

from Ct Comm Gavic to Cassy Hoven's letter "Zoom appearance request denied. Request to re-schedule denied. JRG"
from Cassy Hove re incarcerated in St Croix County until her sentencing on Sept 28 and requesting to reschedule or get approved for zoom.

3:35 PM Cassy Marie Hoven appears in custody from Jail via zoom, Atty Kaitlin Dippolito appears via zoom, ADA Kaley Walker for the State of Wisconsin. Includes 22CF113 and 21CM80 (RW). Court questions non-appearance, Defendant responds. ADA Walker is requesting the warrant be quashed and reinstate the bonds but if she fails to appear again they will ask for cash. Court will quash the warrants and reinstate the bonds. DE plans to retain counsel. Court confirms address and phone number. Atty Dippolito is requesting DE appear by phone for the next hearing, ADA Walker objects. Court will deny that request. Court adjourned at 3:40 pm.
Status conference scheduled for September 6, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

3:05 PM Defendant Cassy Marie Hoven appears in custody from Jail via video, Atty Liesl E. Nelson, ADA Joseph Schieffer appears for the State of Wisconsin.  Court informs Defendant of charges, and possible penalties and rights. Defendant understands. Waives reading. Court reviews DE's rights. ADA Schieffer is requesting a $5,000.00 SIBS w/AS & not to possess, no objection. Court so orders. Court confirms address and phone number. DE does not qualify for PD. Court adjourned at 3:11 pm.  Status conference scheduled for July 1, 2022 at 09:15 am.
